snippet.title: Wing Commander 4: The Price Of Freedom - Official Trailer (Long Version)
snippet.description:
Official trailer (long version) for Wing Commander 4: The Price Of Freedom.

Wing Commander IV: The Price Of Freedom is a classic space combat simulator with a strong storyline. The game is the 4th in the Wing Commander series. Set after the end of the Terran-Kilrathi War, Wing Commander IV depicts a galaxy in the midst of a chaotic transition, with human civilians, Kilrathi survivors and former soldiers on both sides attempting to restabilize their lives. 

Platforms (release date):
- MS-DOS, Windows, Mac OS (February 12,1996)
-  PlayStation (May 14, 1997)
